ai-mil7.8.1:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, what one of these a ten-hundred pot?”
ai-mil7.8.1:1.2_0: “Great king, the pot is not full;

ai-mil7.8.1:1.4_0: This is the basket of a pot.

ai-mil7.8.1:3.1_0: The first pot is the first thing.
